```go
package main 
import "gopkg.in/mgo.v2/bson" 
type poll struct { 
  ID      bson.ObjectId  `bson:"_id" json:"id"` 
  Title   string         `json:"title"` 
  Options []string       `json:"options"` 
  Results map[string]int `json:"results,omitempty"` 
  APIKey  string         `json:"apikey"` 
} 

```
